casebody.data:
STARK, et al
v.
FORD MOTOR COMPANY. No. 313PA10-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 10, 2011. K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, for Stark, Cheyenne Saleena et al. Kirk G. Warner, Raleigh, Robert L. Wise, Adam Charnes, Winston-Salem, for Ford Motor Company. Christopher R. Kiger, Raleigh, Sandra Giannone Ezell, Tobias S. Hampson, Raleigh, Richard J. Keshian, Winston-Salem, Richard D. Dietz, Raleigh, James R. Morgan, Jr., John Edward Pueschel, Winston-Salem, Attorney at Law. Stephen J. Darmody, Miami, Dan J. McLamb, Raleigh, for National Association of Manufacturers, et al. Andrew H. Erteschik, Steven B. Epstein, Raleigh, for NC Assoc. of Defense Attorneys and NC Chamber. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., Raleigh, William F. Womble, Jr., Winston-Salem, Hugh F. Young, Jr., for Product Liability Advisory Council. I. Beverly Lake, Jr., Raleigh, for Former N.C. Legislators H. Parks Helms, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of August 2010 by the National Association of Manufacturers, Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America, American Tort Reform Association, and Property Casualty Insurers Association of America to Admit Mark A. Behrens Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of March 2011."
